entry.summary: ...ICY SPOTS ON ROADWAYS INTO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... Any remaining standing water and slush will freeze solid overnight. entry.summary: ...SLICK TRAVEL POSSIBLE THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... As temperatures dip into the teens overnight, patchy black ice will be possible where surfaces refreeze.
